homeHeader.title: From Search to Registration — Secure Your Business Identity with Our Expert Trade Name Reservation Services
homeHeader.description: Frustrated with stringent trade name regulations, high rejection rates, and endless bureaucracy? At One Nexuz, our experts do all the legwork, ensuring your chosen brand name is fully compliant, officially reserved, and ready for your license application! Build your brand identity, protect your business reputation, and stand out in the UAE's hyper-competitive market with a unique, legally-compliant trade name.

leftSection_5.title: Reserve, Approve, and Protect Your Brand with Our 4-Step Process

items.title: Book a Free Consultation
items.description: We’ll schedule a call at your convenience to discuss your business needs, selected business activity, and preferred jurisdiction.

items.title: Validate Your Tradename
items.description: Next, our experts will help you ideate and pick the best-fit tradename. We’ll also check for duplication and compliance.

items.title: Submit the Necessary Documents
items.description: We’ll assist you in compiling, preparing, and submitting the paperwork to the appropriate Free Zone or Mainland Authority.

items.title: Issue Your Trade Name Certificate
items.description: Finally, we’ll pay the service fees on your behalf, issue your certificate, and send it your way, electronically or through courier.

leftSection_6.title: Why Trust One Nexuz for Professional Trade Name Reservation Services in Dubai, UAE
leftSection_6.description: Avoid costly delays, compliance headaches, and slow approvals with our seasoned PRO specialists by your side. We handle all the paperwork, so you can focus on growing your business.

items.title: Fast, Hassle-Free Tradename Registration
items.description: With our local experts, you can search, reserve, and register the best-fit tradename within seconds to fast-track trade licensing and business setup.

items.title: Zero Hassle, Full UAE Compliance
items.description: Avoid costly delays, hefty fines, and trade name rejections with unique tradenames compliant with the relevant DED or Free Zone Authority.

items.title: Personalised Support Every Step of the Way
items.description: No confusion, no back-and-forth. Our experts offer end-to-end guidance, streamlining all the documentation and approvals for a seamless experience.

leftSection_7.title: Lock in Your Unique Business Name for 6 Months with One Nexuz
leftSection_7.description: Once approved, your trade name is reserved for up to 180 days, giving you the freedom to complete your business licence without losing your identity.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is a tradename reservation?
items.answer: Tradename reservation refers to the official process of obtaining exclusive rights to use a registered trade name.

items.question: How long does it take to reserve a tradename?
items.answer: Typically, a tradename reservation takes 24-48 hours, provided you meet all DED or Free Zone Authority requirements.

items.question: Are there any restrictions on the type of name I can choose?
items.answer: Yes, it’s important to ensure your tradename does not include any political or religious references, offensive terms, or words that do not align with your business activity.

items.question: Does One Nexuz support both UAE Mainland and Free Zone trademarks?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our experts handle all jurisdictions, ensuring compliance across the UAE.

items.question: How long does a tradename reservation last?
items.answer: Typically, the tradename reservation is valid for 6 months, giving you time to register your business and obtain your license.

iconTitleSec.title: Streamline Your Business Launch with Our End-to-End Tradename Reservation Services
